data.comment: The big names in today's match at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas have now been confirmed.
The first-half is now underway.
In the minute 1, Helder Malheiro awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Can Moreirense capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 3, Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 5, In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 7, Throw-in Moreirense.
Pacos Ferreira are pushing forward but Luiz Carlos's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Pacos Ferreira move into a 0-1 lead through a Douglas Tanque header.
Oleg Reabciuk instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 12, Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as Pacos Ferreira is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 14, Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 18, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 20, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
In the minute 22, Pacos Ferreira have a goal kick.
Pacos Ferreira are coming forward and Luther Singh gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
In the minute 24, Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Moreirense needs to be cautious. Pacos Ferreira have an attacking throw-in.
In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 27, In Moreira de Conegos Moreirense attack through Felipe Pires. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Moreira de Conegos.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 28, Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense.
In the minute 34, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 37, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira's Luther Singh gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Helder Malheiro awards Moreirense a goal kick.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira close to the penalty box.
In the minute 40, Helder Malheiro signals a Moreirense throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Pacos Ferreira awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 41, Throw-in for Moreirense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Helder Malheiro signals a Moreirense throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 44, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Andre Luis (Moreirense) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
In the minute 45, 1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Moreira de Conegos.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Moreirense close to the penalty box.
Moreirense's Lazar Rosic breaks free at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Goal kick for Pacos Ferreira at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
The first-half is over.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 47, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Helder Malheiro signals a Pacos Ferreira throw-in in Moreirense's half.
In the minute 50, Pacos Ferreira have a dangerous throw-in.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 51, Moreirense's Goncalo Franco has been booked in Moreira de Conegos.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Throw-in Moreirense.
In the minute 52, Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
Moreirense push forward at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas and Felipe Pires gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Pacos Ferreira defence.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 54, Moreirense surge into the attack at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas but Andre Luisâ€™s header is off-target.
Helder Malheiro awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Free kick Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 55, Helder Malheiro signals a throw-in for Pacos Ferreira, close to Moreirense's area.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Moreira de Conegos.
In the minute 56, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
The home team replace Alex Soares with Filipe Soares.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Moreirense in the half of Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 59, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 60, Moreirense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira advance rapidly upfield but Helder Malheiro blows for offside.
In the minute 62, Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Bruno Costa gets his shot on target but fails to score for Pacos Ferreira.
In Moreira de Conegos Pacos Ferreira drive forward through Oleg Reabciuk. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 63, Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Moreirense.
Moreirense have a goal kick.
Pepa is making the team's first substitution at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas with Mohamed Diaby replacing Luiz Carlos.
Uilton is on a sub for Helder Ferreira for Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 64, Derik Lacerda is replacing Felipe Pires for the home team.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 66, In Moreira de Conegos, Luther Singh of Pacos Ferreira is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In Moreira de Conegos, Mohamed Diaby (Pacos Ferreira) misses the target with a header.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Moreirense goal kick.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in the half of Moreirense.
In the minute 69, Bruno Costa for Pacos Ferreira gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 70, Helder Malheiro signals a Moreirense throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Walterson of Moreirense gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Pacos Ferreira goal kick.
Can Moreirense get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half?
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 73, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Moreirense push upfield and Andre Luis gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Pacos Ferreira defence.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 74, Free kick for Moreirense in their own half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 75, In Moreira de Conegos a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Pacos Ferreira make their third substitution with Joao Amaral replacing Luther Singh.
Moreirense awarded a free kick in their own half.
Pacos Ferreira drives forward and Stephen Eustaquio gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 77, Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Moreirense to take a throw-in in Pacos Ferreira territory.
In the minute 80, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
The away team have replaced Douglas Tanque with Joao Pedro. This is the fourth substitution made today by Pepa.
Moreirense awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Ibrahima Camara is replacing Fabio Pacheco for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 81, David Tavares is replacing Walterson for the home team.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
In the minute 82, Galego is on a sub for Goncalo Franco for Moreirense.
Helder Malheiro awards the home team a throw-in.
Moreirense have been awarded a corner by Helder Malheiro.
In the minute 84, Helder Malheiro signals a Moreirense throw-in in Pacos Ferreira's half.
Pacos Ferreira will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Moreirense.
Moreirense's Ibrahima Camara misses with an attempt on goal.
In the minute 85, Helder Malheiro awards Pacos Ferreira a goal kick.
Important block from the Moreirense defence as Joao Pedro fires in a strike for Pacos Ferreira.
Corner awarded to Pacos Ferreira.
In the minute 86, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Moreirense in their own half.
Ball safe as Moreirense is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 87, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira.
Throw-in for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
Throw-in for Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
In the minute 89, Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Moreirense just outside Pacos Ferreira's area.
Joao Amaral of Pacos Ferreira is pulled up for offside.
Helder Malheiro signals a free kick to Pacos Ferreira in their own half.
Goal kick for Moreirense at Parque de Jogos Comendador Joaquim de Almeida Freitas.
3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in Pacos Ferreira.
Free kick Moreirense.
It's 0-1 as the referee blows for full-time.
